INSERT INTO PM_MAIL( CMPCD , USERCD , MAILNO , MAILTITLE , MAILCONTENT , MAILFILE , FROMUSER , FROMUSERCD , TOUSER , TOUSERCD , CCUSER , CCUSERCD , FROMDATE , READDATE , MAILSTATUS ) VALUES( #{cmpcd} , #{usercd} -- 사번 , #{mailno} , #{mailtitle} -- 메일제목 , #{mailcontent} -- 메일내용
, NULL -- 첨부파일
, #{mailfile} -- 첨부파일
, #{fromuser} -- 보낸사람 , #{fromusercd} -- 보낸사람사번 , #{touser} -- 받는사람(전체) , #{tousercd} -- 받는사람(전체) , #{ccuser} -- 참조(전체) , #{ccusercd} -- 참조사번(전체) , NOW() -- 보낸날짜 , NULL -- 읽은날짜 , #{mailstatus} -- 메일상태 )
mapper.select: SELECT USERCD , USERNAME , USERMAIL FROM PM_USER WHERE CMPCD = #{cmpcd}

SELECT A.MAILNO , A.USERCD , A.MAILTITLE , CASE WHEN IFNULL(A.MAILFILE,'X') = 'X' THEN 'X' ELSE 'Y' END MAILFILE , (SELECT USERNAME FROM PM_USER WHERE USERCD = A.FROMUSERCD) FROMUSERNAME , A.FROMUSER , DATE_FORMAT(A.FROMDATE, '%Y:%m:%d %H:%i') FROMDATE , CASE WHEN IFNULL(A.READDATE, 'X') = 'X' THEN '-' ELSE DATE_FORMAT(A.READDATE, '%Y:%m:%d %H:%i') END READDATE FROM PM_MAIL A WHERE A.CMPCD = #{cmpcd} AND A.USERCD = #{usercd} AND A.MAILSTATUS = #{mailStatus} ORDER BY A.FROMDATE DESC LIMIT #{startNum}, #{nowPageCnt}

SELECT A.MAILNO , A.USERCD , A.MAILTITLE , A.MAILCONTENT , IFNULL(A.MAILFILE,'X') MAILFILE , (SELECT USERNAME FROM PM_USER WHERE USERCD = A.FROMUSERCD) FROMUSERNAME , A.FROMUSER , A.FROMUSERCD , DATE_FORMAT(A.FROMDATE, '%Y:%m:%d %H:%i') FROMDATE , A.TOUSER , A.TOUSERCD , A.CCUSER , A.CCUSERCD FROM PM_MAIL A WHERE A.CMPCD = #{cmpcd} AND A.USERCD = #{usercd} AND A.MAILNO = #{mailno}

SELECT MAX(A.MAILNO) MAILNO , COUNT(A.USERCD) USERCD , MAX(A.MAILTITLE) MAILTITLE , CASE WHEN IFNULL(MAX(A.MAILFILE),'X') = 'X' THEN 'X' ELSE 'Y' END MAILFILE , (SELECT USERNAME FROM PM_USER WHERE USERCD = A.FROMUSERCD) FROMUSERNAME , MAX(A.FROMUSER) FROMUSER , MAX(A.FROMUSERCD) FROMUSERCD , DATE_FORMAT(MAX(A.FROMDATE), '%Y:%m:%d %H:%i') FROMDATE , CASE WHEN IFNULL(MAX(A.READDATE), 'X') = 'X' THEN '-' ELSE DATE_FORMAT(MAX(A.READDATE), '%Y:%m:%d %H:%i') END READDATE FROM PM_MAIL A WHERE A.CMPCD = #{cmpcd} AND A.FROMUSERCD = #{fromusercd} GROUP BY A.MAILNO ORDER BY A.FROMDATE DESC LIMIT #{startNum}, #{nowPageCnt}

SELECT MAX(A.MAILNO) MAILNO , COUNT(A.USERCD) , MAX(A.MAILTITLE) MAILTITLE , MAX(A.MAILCONTENT) MAILCONTENT , IFNULL(MAX(A.MAILFILE),'X') MAILFILE , (SELECT USERNAME FROM PM_USER WHERE USERCD = A.FROMUSERCD) FROMUSERNAME , MAX(A.FROMUSER) FROMUSER , MAX(A.FROMUSERCD) FROMUSERCD , DATE_FORMAT(MAX(A.FROMDATE), '%Y:%m:%d %H:%i') FROMDATE , MAX(A.TOUSER) TOUSER , MAX(A.CCUSER) CCUSER FROM PM_MAIL A WHERE A.CMPCD = #{cmpcd} AND A.FROMUSERCD = #{fromusercd} AND A.MAILNO = #{mailno} GROUP BY A.MAILNO
